title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 2.1 : Using the Linear ODE

media:group.media:title: CalcGREEN 2 : Ch. 2.1 : Using the Linear ODE
media:group.media:description: The first-order linear ODE is so useful! Let's take a look at the many ways in which this equation models exponential growth and decay in physical, economic, and social systems.
